documentation.text:
@title House escrow for single-player coinflip with off-chain provably fair result
 @notice The backend signs the round result; contract verifies signature and pays player if valid.

documentation.text:
@title Peer-to-peer Coinflip Escrow with Commit-Reveal
 @notice Minimal draft: holds funds for two players, verifies commit-reveal, settles deterministically.
